title: Releaf
description: A SPA crowdfunding website for natural disaster victims that allows users to create an account and raise money through donations to help rebuild what they've lost.
stack: ReactJS, React-Router, PostgreSQL, ExpressJS, NodeJS, Material-UI, Stripe

title: Mamma Mia's Food Pick-Up App
description: A website for a fictional restaurant that offers online food ordering and pick-up. Customers will receive an SMS upon submitting their order, and another upon the restaurant's confirmation.

title: Scheduler
description: An interview scheduler that allows students to book, delete, and edit appointments with interviewers for a selected day.
stack: ReactJS, Axios, Storybook, Cypress, Classnames, SASS

title: Tweeter
description: A single-paged Twitter clone that allows users to make 'tweets' within a character count.

title: Pong
description: Classic game of Pong. Use a/z and m/k keys to move the paddles.

title: DVD Logo Screensaver
description: Time wasted waiting for it to hit the corners.
